diagrams.description: A timeline showing the history of Mechatronics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
timeline
    title The History of Mechatronics
    section 1960s-1970s: The Birth of Mechatronics
        1969 : The term "mechatronics" is coined by Tetsuro Mori
        1970s : Early applications in industrial robots and CNC machines
    section 1980s: The Microprocessor Revolution
        1980s : Microprocessors enable more intelligent and integrated systems
        1980s : Development of anti-lock braking systems (ABS)
    section 1990s: The Rise of Smart Products
        1990s : Widespread use of mechatronics in consumer products (e.g., autofocus cameras, VCRs)
    section 2000s: The Era of Automation
        2000s : Advancements in robotics, automation, and autonomous systems
        2000s : Segway is launched
    section 2010s: The Age of IoT and AI
        2010s : The Internet of Things (IoT) connects mechatronic systems
        2010s : AI and machine learning are integrated into mechatronic systems
